__e: DAVID: She doesn't want them killed by atomic bombs!

The ones who were killed by us years ago?
Those people were killed by something. Not me.
Surely not everybody's been lost in action.
Her folks was killed in the same raid your pa was.

Did you kill them for that?
I know, sir, but people get killed. Properly dead, sir.
I didn't kill them for you.

- My-My parents were killed. My husband also.

- Who do you think killed them?
